DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Diagnostic procedure , digital colposcopy , may help doctor find diagnose cervical intraepithelial neoplasia . PURPOSE : This clinical trial study digital colposcopy see well work find cervical intraepithelial neoplasia .
DOC.brief_title: Digital Colposcopy Finding Cervical Intraepithelial Neoplasia
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To identify potential improvement noninvasive method diagnose cervical dysplasia neoplasia use digital colposcopy fluorescence spectroscopic imaging . - To measure fluorescence reflectance image human cervix vivo use digital colposcopy . - To evaluate effect acetic acid image contrast obtain . - To compare device performance colposcopic impression histopathologic interpretation tissue remove standard loop electrosurgical excision procedure ( LEEP ) . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Participants undergo routine colposcopy part regular colposcopic evaluation . The digital colposcope use take fluorescence reflectance image vagina cervix . Participants also undergo loop electrosurgical excision procedure ( LEEP ) . The digital colposcopic image compare tissue remove LEEP . Additional surrogate biomarkers development also measure use tissue sample remove LEEP , quantitative histopathology measurement , DNA test copy number change , test incorporation viral HPV DNA .
